website_summaries.verdict: When braving the winter seasons, it’s essential to keep feet dry and warm. This is where the Fizik Artica R5 comes in handy. This winter bike shoe presents an impermeable structure for long-lasting comfort through extreme conditions.It ticks all the essentials when it comes to footwear that can make winter riding more pleasurable. However, if you demand uber stiff soles, you should look elsewhere.
pros: Almost everyone who has tried the Fizik Artica R5 delights at the shoe’s insulating abilities, as it keeps feet feeling warm no matter the temperature
Most of the reviewers appreciate the pair’s principally waterproof construct
This Fizik road cycling shoe receives plenty of praise for its easy-to-clean materials
Several consumers love the sleek styling of the Artica R5
Some testers have been pleasantly surprised at how light the footwear feels despite its seemingly bulky design
A few wearers appreciate the reflective detailing in the back of the shoe, enhancing the rider’s safety
cons: Several riders say that water still goes inside the boot whenever it downpours
A good number of users gripe about how the high cuff could feel restrictive
Some cyclists say that the Artica R5’s stiffness is not up to par with performance shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, WARM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Winter Road rides in Bend. Two 40 mile rides with them now and I'm completely satisfied. They are easy to get on, fasten securely and are toasty warm with regular weight Merino wool socks. Took them out in 29F and 33F with no issues. Now, if I could only find the right gloves...
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when it looked like we were in for a rainy winter. Since then, though, it's been pretty dry. I did ride a few hundred miles with these over the colder months and they kept my feet warm when it was chilly out. The ad copy didn't state it, but my shoes came with cleats in the box. They were easy to install and have stayed tight since the day I installed them. No complaints--a good pair of shoes for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven A Seebart

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sizing drop down
customer_reviews.text: Not a review of the product but rather of amazon's sizing drop down. I am a size 10.5 or 43.5 EU. First order, drop down (12.5 US) because the cart has the shoe size as 43.5 EU. I received the 12.5, I returned the product. Second order, I select 10.5 US in the drop down, cart has 41.5 EU. Surprise, I receive a 41.5 EU shoe size, time to return this one as well. I would advise to purchase these where the shoe size is universal and not Russian roulette.
customer_reviews.author: geraldo agramonte

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep feet comfortable in cool to cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: A ride at 38 degrees, comfortable feet! So much easier to use than shoes covers & much more effective. The place system is fine, the zipper outside easy. I bought 1/2 size larger, thinking warmer, thicker socks would demand it. Nope, my normal Fizik, Sidi size was correct. Best cold-weather cycling purchase in a good while.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on sizing. Boot seemed overly narrow and perhaps two sizes smaller than detailed.
customer_reviews.text: Great style great price yet sizing missed the mark. Your info on sizing stated, UK50/ US15. I imagine that it fit like a narrow US size 13 would. Could not get my foot into the cycling boot. I have never had narrow or wide feet. I am a size US14.5. Refund/ crediting my CC was just a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for riding in colder weather
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run true to size and keep my feet warm down into the low 30’s with my regular road socks
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for - these are of very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 US and these 43.5s fit perfectly. As for performance, buy with confidence. These let no water in at all, keep your feet warm, and are nice and stiff. If you're really getting wet you might have water run from your pants/socks into these, in which case they might as well be bowls to hold water in. They're completely sealed. Worth it to consider booties that go over these so that water drips down their sides instead of into them for very wet rides. Would buy again and recommend to anyone looking for a waterproof riding solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon size drop down
customer_reviews.text: if you order through amazon and select the size through the drop down, you can either get the US sized based on what shoes in the cart or the EU size based on what shows in the drop down. Long story short, you can order this twice and get the wrong size and have to return these twice. Purchase these somewhere that has one sizing option.
customer_reviews.author: geraldo agramonte

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter rides
customer_reviews.text: This is the second season I've used these, and they have greatly improved my comfort on cold morning rides. Toe covers seem to work down to about 45F, but below that my toes were cold. These have worked for me down to 30F, with one pair of thick wool socks. The speed lacing system works very well, easy to get a comfortable snugness. I wear 43's normally, Fizik and Specialized, ordered 43.5 to allow for thicker socks and they fit great. They feel a little stiff above the ankle at first, but you get used to it after a few rides.
customer_reviews.author: Ride 1488

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Sometimes I over tighten but that's just my habit I need to break. Feel always warm unless it's freezing temperatures out. Rode in the 40s and it was great. Rain and my feet were warm.
customer_reviews.author: DImitriy

customer_reviews.title: Great winter cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Fizik shoes (and 4th pair of winter cycling boots). These are now my first choice for winter cycling. The others are Sidi, Lake Sport, and Gaerne. The Fizik shoes have a zipper instead of Velcro closures (although there is a Velcro strap at the top). So far, they have been impervious to exterior moisture; my feet are dry and warm at the end of a 3-4.5 hour ride, even in a drizzle. I haven't ridden them in a steady rain yet....
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Timm

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart does not match what size are on the order form
customer_reviews.text: Size chart not right. I have ordered a size 10 twice and received a size 81/4 both times. The sizing chart does not match up with the size you are able to order. For example there is no size ten on the sizing chart, but you can order a size ten when you place an order. When you do you get a size 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: They are warm
customer_reviews.text: I have been able to ride through the winter in NY thanks to this shoes. Days of -6 Celsius (21 Ferenheit) I was able to ride for several hours. Still whenever is very cold out I put additional shoe covers on top.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I  Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and warm. I had no issues all spring. Rode many times in temps between 35 and 45
customer_reviews.author: mmerg

customer_reviews.title: Best friend for freezing adventures
customer_reviews.text: I put these through severe winter tests - because it is stupidly cold - and they made otherwise unrideable days rideable. Really a fine shoe that does what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hull

customer_reviews.title: Keep your toes warm !
customer_reviews.text: Strange wearing high tops to rides but comfy and warm
customer_reviews.author: Dav Mag

customer_reviews.title: Ideal cold-weather cycling gear
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit,very secure and keeps my feet warm in early December Maine.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: It is as I expected it. All Italian products are always perfectly done.
customer_reviews.author: APrandelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots for cold-weather road riding
customer_reviews.text: Good looking boot ,pretty warm tho in the low 30s I use a cover for extra warmth,Fits pretty well with my narrow foot
customer_reviews.author: steven m.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I should have switched to winter shoes long ago. No covers to hassle with. Just put them on and ride. Room for thick warm socks also. love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Masey

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: They were to hard to zip up and not comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.author: james rowe

customer_reviews.title: great product. Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: As all Fizik shoes, great product. Can't go wrong. Superior quality.
customer_reviews.author: MARCIN S.

customer_reviews.title: Made to be a winter shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair for 2 years and am generally very satisfied. Pretty warm, pretty good fit, durable, and obviously designed to be a winter boot, not just a summer shoe with a rubber cover attached, way better than a shoe of that type I had previously If I get another pair of these I might order +1 size (46 instead of 45), to allow a little more wiggle room If I get another pair of something else, I'd look for more warmth
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Lipowicz

product_meta.title: Fizik Men's R5 Artica Cycling Shoe
product_meta.description: Artic R5 is the perfect winter road cycling shoe for warmth, comfort, protection and performance riding in even the coldest, wettest conditions. Fully waterproof, easy to fit and featuring advanced insulation properties, artic R5 beats the elements, yet is a lightweight and stiff high performance shoe. Like all fizzy: k's performance road shoes, the artic R5 benefits from our program of designing with, and for, leading professional racing cyclists to create the best possible shoes for you, whatever the season.
feature_bullets: Internal speed lacing system makes fitting to your foot shape quick and accurate
Microtel reinforced shell offers structured support while the breathable Membrane maximizes airflow
Winter edition cycling insole, which features a cozy fleece upper and an insulating aluminum foil underside, for all-season warmth
Carbon composite outsole is light and stiff for maximum power transfer
Waterproof outer is easy to clean and the waterproof zip ensures that the worst of the weather stays out

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars4 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
